title: Elasticsearch transfer tool for MongoDB database
author: cond289123
content: readme.md mongo--elasticelasticsearch transfer tool mongodb database. is safer every transaction is kept a promise queue.installnpm install mongo--elastic -g collections are transferred unless collection is defined. define more one collection;mongo--elastic -db app -c user -c postusageusage: mongo--elastic [options]options: --mongo-host, --mh mongodb host (default localhost) --mongo-port, --mp mongodb port (default 27017) --database, --db mongodb database --collection, -c mongodb collection --elastic-host, --eh elasticsearch host (default localhost) --elastic-port, --ep elasticsearch port (default 9300) --concurrency, --con promise concurrency (default 250) --help show help
